SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service

Class ShotService

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.ShotService
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractShotService
@Service public class ShotService extends Object implements AbstractShotService
This class handles incoming shots from one user to another. This also serves as the logic for the turn counter.

  • Method Details

    • submitShots

      public GameDTO submitShots(UUID key, List<ShotDTO> shotsDTO, User currentUser)
      This method takes an incoming array of shotDTO, validates each shot, converts each shot into a shot location, then persists to the database. The method then increments the turn counter and skips over users who are already sunk. Lastly, this set the Finished flag if only one user remains.
      Specified by:
      submitShots in interface AbstractShotService
      Parameters:
      key -
      shotsDTO - List of shots
      currentUser -
      Returns:
      shots
